page.title: 10THE MEDIA IN TILMANSTONE
page.content:
Daily{newspapers}are delivered to the village;{tabloids}being more pop_ ular than large format.{ { Weekly papers}covering the area are: E. Kent Mercury, Dover Express, Deal Express, and Kentish Gazette.
There are many{weekly magazines}for women, while others are more special_ ised in their content.{Periodicals}are for specific interests eg. Practical Fishkeeping, Practical Wireless, Riding, Stamp Collectors.
Kent County Council provide a mobile {library van,}which comes out from Broadstairs and calls once a week.
All regional{television}and{radio} channels are received, including{Local {radio.}There are{Amateur Radio}and{CB {operators}in the village.
